title: Set up project structure and dependencies
description: Create the basic project structure including directories, requirements.txt, and README.md file with installation and usage instructions.

title: Implement BeautifulSoup scraper module
description: Create a module that uses BeautifulSoup to extract the initial page source code, including functions to parse HTML and extract relevant content.

title: Implement Playwright scraper module
description: Develop a module that uses Playwright for light and fast scraping of dynamic content, including handling of JavaScript-rendered pages.

title: Implement Selenium scraper module
description: Create a module that uses Selenium for heavy-duty scraping of complex websites with extensive JavaScript and dynamic content that requires browser interaction.

title: Implement CSV data storage module
description: Develop a module to store scraped data (URL, site title, and content) in CSV format with proper error handling and file management.

title: Develop main application logic
description: Create the main application module that integrates all scraping tools, implements tool selection logic, and provides a unified interface for the user.

title: Implement testing suite
description: Create comprehensive tests for each module and the integrated application, including unit tests and integration tests with sample websites of varying complexity.
